name: Praise Them!
description:
For the sleepy village of Kost located in the woodlands, you are the local deity.

The villagers live their lives, day to day, under the blessings and punishments you deem worthy to fill their lives with. This interaction with you empowers you, and allows you to utilise more of your power.

However, using this power drains you, and without it you are just a humble spectator on the sidelines, watching their lives play out.

To make sure that never happens, you must ensure the villagers have sufficient faith in you so that you may use your powers to embolden their faith in you.

How you choose to use your powers, and what kind of deity you choose to be is up to you alone.

Controls:
WASD - Move Camera
Q/E - Rotate Camera
Left Mouse Click - Execute
Mouse Scroll Wheel - Scroll Camera Distance
